content.text:
# Calverley and Farsley (ward)

| party1      = Labour
| councillor2 = Craig Timmins
| party2      = Labour
| councillor3 = Andrew Carter
| party3      = Conservative
| population     = 18,466
| population_ref = (2023 electorate)
| area_total_km2 =
| area_footnotes =
| hide_services = yes
}}
Calverley and Farsley is an electoral ward of Leeds City Council in west Leeds, West Yorkshire, including the village of Calverley and town of Farsley.
